originalText.text: Anoj has done work for me for the last few years and he is the best. He’s very thorough with every job and he explains all of the options for you. I live in an old house that always needs work so it gives me peace of mind knowing i can use someone like Anoj. i highly recommend. you won’t be disappointed. Thank you for taking the time to read my review.

originalText.text: Being a small business owner I look for any advantage I can get.  I needed some electrical work done on my store. So I reached out to Lycas Electric.  To my surprise, Lycas is also a small business so in support of small business owners I decided to give them a try.  The owner Anoj showed up on time. (which is always a breath of fresh air when dealing with any contractors) Anoj was clean and professional.  He explained the problem to me and repaired it professionally.  I was expecting a large invoice for the work. And again to my surprise. It was a lot less than I thought.  So if you're looking for a reliable electrician I highly recommend  Lycas Electric.

originalText.text: Anoj is very professional, knowledgeable and overall genuine person. He was able to thoroughly explain and fix all of our electrical issues. He will be our go-to electrician for everything moving forward. I will definitely refer him to everyone I know.

text.text: Anoj is very professional, knowledgeable and overall genuine person. He was able to thoroughly explain and fix all of our electrical issues. He will be our go-to electrician for everything moving forward. I will definitely refer him to everyone I know.

originalText.text: Anaj is the best. He has done everything from installing an intercom system to running network cables and installing an electrical panel to installing recessed lighting. He is fast clean and respectful. You’ll know the job has been done correctly and to code. I highly recommend using Lycas electric.

He is fast clean and respectful. You’ll know the job has been done correctly and to code. I highly recommend using Lycas electric.

originalText.text: I called Anoj for a faulty and spark damaged outlet in my rental property.  He quickly returned my call and scheduled an appointment.  He showed on-time and completed the repair with unnecessary upselling.  I highly recommend.  A pure professional.
